name: Snow King Mermaid Dress Up - Mermaid Girls Games - Dress up the snow king
name_original: Snow King Mermaid Dress Up - Mermaid Girls Games - Dress up the snow king
description: One day, The King of Snow had a dream, dreamed that she turned into a pretty and cute mermaid. After waking up, she wanted to put herself into a mermaid.Let's help her dress up.
